author: kylem
msg: - Fix to argument name generation code in AptMethodHelper
- Tighten the @Target annotation for Control PropertySet annotations.  Since PropertySets are
themselves always annotation types, the @Target decl should reflect this.  Doesn't change any
existing use cases or code, just provides tighter validation of use.

author: niclas
msg: addition of support for arbitary <configuration> elements within a component defintion (BlockTask) and refactoring of the implementation to enable cleaner support for MD5 and ASC file creation. Patch submitted by Stephen McConnell.

author: rich
msg: Fixed up the rest of the copyright headers on the test .jpf files (thanks Roy).
